title: Bug 121687: Exception throws when exporting data in a table inside a grid cell.
description: When attempting to export data from a table nested within a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
OB: An exception occurs in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() when exporting data from a table within a grid cell.
EB: Export data from two tables. Expected result: Data is exported without errors.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to a grid containing tables.
2. Within a grid cell, attempt to export data from the table.
3. Observe the exception in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() method.
